ISSUE.TITLE: Define project model in Swagger spec
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently the Swagger spec doesn't have any data model information. We should define the data model for projects

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add Slack notification for Travis CI status messages

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Draft definition of project model/schema using Swagger. #11
Define a ProjectList schema so we have a top-level object instead of plain array as the response, allowing for extensibility. #11
